title: You Adore Me
description: “I know it’s a bit difficult for you — our difference in age. That’s why I didn’t want to open up to you about my past. It’s been trying enough to keep you from running away from me without adding even more burden to our relationship. The last thing I want to do is scare you away, Rachel.”As Tyler and Rachel find themselves deep in the throes of passion, things seem to be going perfectly. They’re both surprised by how ardent the other is and how intense they feel for one another. But, as their relationship progresses, they find that hidden issues are coming to light. The type of complications that could change everything …But as Tyler’s ex-girlfriend suddenly comes back into the picture, and Rachel has a seemingly innocuous date with a colleague, jealousy and insecurity rear their heads. Making their relationship far more difficult than Rachel and Tyler had ever imagined. Ghosts from the past threaten their newfound love, and suddenly they realize that a decision has to be made.Will Tyler and Rachel fight for each other? Or will each tumultuous wave cause them to drift further and further apart? Author J.M. Buckley presents the compelling sequel in the “Adore” series, “You Adore Me.”
author: J.M. Buckley
